verbs.description: relativize (third-person singular simple present relativizes, present participle relativizing, simple past and past participle relativized)

entries.meaning: To make one thing relative to another.
examples: However, many thinkers (Protestant and Catholic) have used historical-critical methods to relativize New Testament materials on sex and gender to their original settings, rather quickly substituting for "obsolete" moral prohibitions a modern, liberal set of values […]
